turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, it's me, can you help with a Starbucks order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, from the one on Colorado and Cloverfield?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please. May I have a venti iced Cafe Mocha?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, a Venti Iced Cafe Mocha.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: With soy milk and two shots of vanilla.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: With soy and two shots vanilla.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, let's add another two shots of hazelnut to that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Two shots of vanilla and two shots hazelnut.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Right, and also whipped cream. Extra please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: With extra whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And can I get a caramel drizzle on top of that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, some caramel drizzle on top of the whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And also, can we make that two shots of sugar free vanilla please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Two shots of sugar free vanilla instead.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All right, so I have a venti iced Cafe Mocha with soy milk, two shots of sugar free vanilla and two shots of hazelnut...

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: â€¦and then extra whipped cream with caramel drizzle on top.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You're amazing, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, placing your order. You're all set for pickup from Colorado and Cloverfield. Would you like a texted receipt?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That would be great. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: My pleasure. Enjoy your drink.
